entry.title: As a firefighter, I face intense situations that can take a toll on mental health, leading to PTSD. It's crucial to break the stigma around this issue by openly discussing our experiences and seeking help. Movement is medicine; regular exercise can signif
entry.content: As a firefighter, I face intense situations that can take a toll on mental health, leading to PTSD. It's crucial to break the stigma around this issue by openly discussing our experiences and seeking help. Movement is medicine; regular exercise can signif

entry.title: Finished Crazy Mountain 100 haven't slept in 38 hours more later #crazymountain100 #ultrarunner #runtok
entry.content: Finished Crazy Mountain 100 haven't slept in 38 hours more later #crazymountain100 #ultrarunner #runtok

entry.title: Happy Medal Monday what do you get for running 100 hard mountain miles in Montana? you get this amazing belt buckle and a lifetime of memories #crazymountain100 #runtok #ultrarunner
entry.content: Happy Medal Monday what do you get for running 100 hard mountain miles in Montana? you get this amazing belt buckle and a lifetime of memories #crazymountain100 #runtok #ultrarunner

entry.title: Running 100 miles solo and unsupported means carrying a lot of gear. You never know what you'll need, so it's best to pack a bit on the heavy side. In the end, I used almost everything except my med kit. It's better to be over-prepared than under-prepared
entry.content: Running 100 miles solo and unsupported means carrying a lot of gear. You never know what you'll need, so it's best to pack a bit on the heavy side. In the end, I used almost everything except my med kit. It's better to be over-prepared than under-prepared

entry.title: This week's edition was brought to you by David Goggins fans. Don't worry, there were a lot of running is bad for your knees comments too. And I look old. And I'm unhealthy. The usual suspects. Smile, or you're doing it wrong. #hatersgonnahate #ultrarunn
entry.content: This week's edition was brought to you by David Goggins fans. Don't worry, there were a lot of running is bad for your knees comments too. And I look old. And I'm unhealthy. The usual suspects. Smile, or you're doing it wrong. #hatersgonnahate #ultrarunn

entry.title: That was really hard. Here's the TL;DR version for those of you that can't watch the 8 minute version. I know long format isn't for everyone but I hate making part 1 and 2. Smile, or you're doing it wrong. #runtok #ultrarunner #crazymountain100
entry.content: That was really hard. Here's the TL;DR version for those of you that can't watch the 8 minute version. I know long format isn't for everyone but I hate making part 1 and 2. Smile, or you're doing it wrong. #runtok #ultrarunner #crazymountain100

entry.title: Pulled off the win although I had to really work for it. 100 miles/161 km does not come easily. Especially when the race starts at 6pm. Born to Run 100 miler was an incredible experience and I will be back. #runtok #ultramarathon #ultrarunner #borntorun
entry.content: Pulled off the win although I had to really work for it. 100 miles/161 km does not come easily. Especially when the race starts at 6pm. Born to Run 100 miler was an incredible experience and I will be back. #runtok #ultramarathon #ultrarunner #borntorun
